contentrichtext.text: {{DISPLAYTITLE:''King Solomon's Mines'' (film)}} '''''[[King Solomon's Mines]]''''', H. Rider Haggard's 1885 adventure novel, has been adapted to the following films: * [[King Solomon's Mines (1937 film)|''King Solomon's Mines'' (1937 film)]], a British film * [[King Solomon's Mines (1950 film)|''King Solomon's Mines'' (1950 film)]], an American production * ''[[King Solomon's Treasure]]'' (1979), a British-Canadian low budget version * [[King Solomon's Mines (1985 film)|''King Solomon's Mines'' (1985 film)]], a new American version, filmed in Zimbabwe * [[King Solomon's Mines (1986 film)|''King Solomon's Mines'' (1986 telemovie)]], an Australian animated film from the [[Burbank, California|Burbank]] studios * [[King Solomon's Mines (2004 film)|''King Solomon's Mines'' (2004 film)]], an American television miniseries ==Related films== * [[Allan Quatermain (film)|''Allan Quatermain'' (film)]], 1919 film *''[[Watusi (film)|Watusi]]'', 1959 sequel to the 1950 film * ''[[Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold]]'', 1987 film with [[Richard Chamberlain]] * [[The_Search_For_King_Solomon%27s_Mines|''The Search For King Solomon's Mines'' (2002 documentary)]], commissioned by National Geographic Television and UK's Channel 4 * ''[[The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen (film)]]'', 2003 film with Allan Quatermain portrayed by [[Sean Connery]] * ''[[The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines]]'', 2006 [[Turner_Network_Television|TNT]] television film * ''[[Allan Quatermain and the Temple of Skulls]]'', 2008 film {{SIA|films}}
